title: Revitalize Tasks.UnitTests2 tests
body:
There's a folder https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/tree/e6e619d4e28e27a127f5efb7c7bfbde0849c68b2/src/Tasks.UnitTests2 that hasn't ever built in open-source MSBuild.

We should either delete it or bring it back. Unfortunately, a quick look didn't reveal how valuable the tests were--there's a lot of boilerplate but also some actual tests.
